Package gameobjects.components

Class BoxBounds

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.components.Component
gameobjects.components.BoxBounds
public class BoxBounds extends Component
A component to define a box-shaped bound for a gameobject.

    BoxBounds​(GameObject parent, int x, int y, int width, int height)
